attributes.action: No pay rise to politicians and salaries to be made public knowledge.
attributes.additional_details: Take accountability and convey some form of care for the country they run. We are not paying taxes to be made a profit from so politicians can live a life of luxury and fall asleep/not even turn up to debates.
attributes.background: A cut to existing wages/expenses, in this unprecedented time, politicians are over paid, with our hard earned tax money. With what WORK is actually done by politicians, we have no idea EXACTLY where our money is spent. In other businesses every single penny would have to be accounted for.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/

You can read more about salaries and the publication of expenses here:

https://www.parliament.uk/about/mps-and-lords/members/pay-mps/
